lessons.japanese: 学生側にはなんの異論もなかった。
lessons.english: There was no objection on the part of the students.

lessons.japanese: 我々の代表は新税の計画に異論を唱えた。
lessons.english: Our representative argued against the new tax plan.
There is no objection on my part.

lessons.japanese: 異論がなければここで会を閉じることにしよう。
lessons.english: If there is no objection, we will close the meeting now.

lessons.japanese: 私はといえば、異論はない。
lessons.english: As for me, I have no objection.

lessons.japanese: 私に関する限り異論はない。
lessons.english: So far as I am concerned there is no objection.

lessons.japanese: 私に関する限り、その案に異論はありません。
lessons.english: So far as I am concerned, there is no objection to the plan.

lessons.japanese: 私としては異論はありません。
lessons.english: For my part, I have no objection.

lessons.japanese: 学生側にはなんの異論もなかった。
lessons.english: There was no objection on the part of the students.

lessons.japanese: 我々の代表は新税の計画に異論を唱えた。
lessons.english: Our representative argued against the new tax plan.
There is no objection on my part.

lessons.japanese: 異論がなければここで会を閉じることにしよう。
lessons.english: If there is no objection, we will close the meeting now.

lessons.japanese: 私としては異論はありません。
lessons.english: For my part, I have no objection.

lessons.japanese: 私に関する限り、その案に異論はありません。
lessons.english: So far as I am concerned, there is no objection to the plan.

lessons.japanese: 私に関する限り異論はない。
lessons.english: So far as I am concerned there is no objection.
